alert.note: Alert for Moore (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 18 at 8:13PM CDT until May 18 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN POTTER AND SOUTHERN MOORE COUNTIES... At 813 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Masterson, or 18 miles southwest of Dumas, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Masterson and Four Way. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
